title: Buy McDonald’s Stock Because of ‘Solid Underlying Fundamentals’
text:
McDonald’s stock has performed well in 2019, and while the company’s third-quarter sales might not come in as strong as some bulls hope, J.P. Morgan thinks the fast-food giant is still worth buying.

The back story. McDonald’s shares (ticker: MCD) have risen 18% year to date, just trailing the S&P 500’s 2019 rally. Fast-food stocks as a whole have done well this year, but McDonald’s has also reported strong earnings, and recently raised its dividend. The company has moved quickly to embrace technology in its restaurants,...
description: J.P. Morgan analyst John Ivankoe reiterated an Overweight rating and $230 price target on McDonald’s. But he warned that third-quarter comparable sales could come in below consensus estimates.
